name: Department Of Ophthalmology
description: The types of family child care homes vary widely, from the neighborhood parent who cares for a few children to a large family child care home that cares for up to 14 children.
serviceDetail: Licensed family child care homes refer to child care in an individual's private home. ... The types of family child care homes vary widely, from the neighborhood parent who cares for a few children to a large family child care home that cares for up to 14 children. A family child care home is a business.

name: Department Of Dentistry
description: Dentistry, also known as dental medicine and oral medicine, is the branch of medicine focused on the teeth, gums, and mouth. It consists of the study, diagnosis, prevention, management, and treatment of diseases, disorders, and conditions of the mouth, most commonly focused on dentition as well as the oral mucosa.
serviceDetail: Dentistry, the profession concerned with the prevention and treatment of oral disease, including diseases of the teeth and supporting structures and diseases of the soft tissues of the mouth.

name: Department Of Orthopedics
description: One of best the orthopaedic department in the country, serving to provide 360º care as a Bone & Joint Centre. The Department of Orthopaedics has two full-time Consultants, Two part-time Consultant, a number of junior doctors, and supporting paramedical staff trained to deliver a 100% success rate. Our team diagnoses, operates and treats problems affecting the bones, joints and muscles of patients encompassing all age groups.
serviceDetail: The Department of Orthopaedics offers out-patient consultation services and procedures. It is well supported by fully equipped operation theatre (OT), intensive care units for pre- and post- operative care, as well as rehabilitation services in Physiotherapy Department. The state-of-the-art OT is equipped all updated facilities. The hospital is also equipped with CT scan (500 slice), MRI Scan (1.5 tesla), and Digital X-ray for prompt screening facilities.

name: Department Of Nephrology
description: Nephrology is kidney medicine and is a subspecialty of internal medicine. It is concerned with the diagnoses, treatment and management of kidney functions and renal (kidney) replacement therapy, such as dialysis and kidney transplantation.
serviceDetail: Nephrology is the subspecialty of internal medicine that focuses on the diagnosis and treatment of diseases of the kidney. Because the kidney performs so many critical functions, nephrologists maintain expertise in primary kidney disorders, but also the management of the systemic consequences of kidney dysfunction.

name: Department Of Cardiology
description: We offer the latest techniques and cardiac care to patients of all ages. We treat patients with common heart problems such as angina to rare heart conditions.With the help of State-of-the-heart-technology, equipment and monitoring devices, our cardiologists are providing excellent heart care to all the patients. Our department has the best cardiologists and heart specialists in Dhaka, who are highly specialized and has years of experience and expertise in cardiac care.
serviceDetail: Our cardiologists provide 24 hour dedicated service and is the only hospital of Bangladesh where emergency angioplasty can be carried out round the clock. It is operated by a strong and dedicated team of 4 cardiologists – Consultants Dr. N. A. M. Momenuzzaman, Dr. Kaisar Nasrullah Khan, Dr. Fatema Begum Dr. Reyan Anis and Dr. A. M. Shafique. With the help of their extensive knowledge and supreme clinical practices, we are well efficient to treat the significant procedures, the best heart specialists in the heart of the Country

name: Department Of Dermatology
description: Best Hospital for Corona Treatment in Dhaka Life &Care Hospital. has the most robust and comprehensive COVID care facility in the country.provides 24/7 specialist coverage in Emergency to triage & identify COVID & Non-COVID patients, reliable Coronavirus/ COVID test by RT PCR method in out-patient, Post Covid Rehab, home sample collection,bulk sample collection & fast track service.
serviceDetail: The best hospitals for treating patients with Coronavirus in Dhaka. United Hospital provides 24/7 specialist coverage in Emergency to triage & identify COVID & Non-COVID patients, reliable Coronavirus/ COVID test by RT PCR method in out-patient, Post Covid Rehab, home sample collection, bulk sample collection & fast track service.
